column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=What will it take to get Congressional Hearings to review the Church of Scientology ?
#Text=Specifically , their tax-exempt status .
#Text=M.B. :
#Text=It is going to take a groundswell of media interest into the abuses ( of the Church ) before it happens .
#Text=There 's a lot of work that needs to be done .
#Text=On public knowledge versus Scientologist knowledge , that is troubling for me .
#Text=We on the outside know what is in store for the people moving onto the bridge .
#Text=I think it is bait and switch to not tell them that their real problems are they are covered with BT 's [ Body Thetans , ed . ] .
#Text=That 's a major case of fraud in my mind .

#Text=( ( WN ) ) What , if any , changes or improvements have been made in Church policy and structure since Hubbard died , and more recently too , that might have already addressed , at least partially , issues such as Snow White , Lisa McPherson , disconnection , unrealistic promises of Scientology benefits , etc ? On what do you base your answer to this question ?
#Text=M.B. :
#Text=The only major policy change I 've seen from David Miscaviage is the introduction of the Lisa Clause .

#Text=What Scientology learned from the tragic death of Lisa McPherson is to have all their members sign a form to say they grant Scientology the right to treat them as they did Lisa and to promise not to sue .
#Text=Otherwise the group seems to be as militant as when Hubbard was still around which is astonishing in a way .
#Text=A cult usually dies with its founder .
#Text=I believe Scientology is a cult yet it lurches on with the help of its richest members and the ability to bleed dry the rank and file .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) I assume you mean " Lisa Clause " ?
#Text=M.B. : Yes .
#Text=Lisa Clause .
#Text=As to Scientologists who say that I do n't know what I 'm talking about , why do I have documents to back up my claims and they have shore stories ?

#Text=( ( WN ) ) How do you think most Church members feel about your protests ? What would you say to those who would criticize your protests as misguided or the information you post and expose as untrue ?
#Text=M.B. :
#Text=We are seeing some indications that the Scientologists inside the group are responding to the protests .
#Text=There was one insider who got a message of support out .
#Text=Clearly , when materials like the Tom Cruise tape are being leaked , there are people inside who are concerned about how the group is behaving .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) We have a somewhat difficult question to put next ... Is R2-45 Auditing a joke within Scientology , or is it actually real ?
#Text=M.B. :
#Text=I think it was probably a sick joke by Hubbard but he did actually put it in some orders .
#Text=It 's not anything I ever discuss .
#Text=There is so much sensational material about Scientology .
#Text=People find it hard to believe the actual truth .
#Text=I have no knowledge of anyone being shot by Scientology and would n't claim otherwise .
#Text=That said , I find it unbelievably odd that DM 's mother-in-law supposedly committed suicide by shooting herself with a shotgun ... three times .
#Text=That 's weird .
#Text=But I wo n't say it 's murder .
